translation.name: Lexigram
translation.wordleDesc: Start your Wondrous Word Adventure! Uncover hidden meanings, decipher cryptic clues, and unleash the magic of single words. Become a linguistic virtuoso, mastering the art of vocabulary. Dive into a world where every letter sparks a miracle. Are you ready to write your own word-powered legend?
translation.phraserDesc: Embark on a Phrase Puzzle adventure! Assemble hidden word combinations to solve enchanted challenges. Unlock your linguistic brilliance and uncover the power of language. Dive into a world where every phrase holds the key to victory. Are you ready to master the art of word play?
translation.dictatorDesc: Take on the Spelling Genius challenges! Unlock your linguistic prowess and conquer mystical challenges. Dive into a world where every letter holds the power to captivate. Are you ready to write your own legendary tale?
translation.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up

rules.title: Become a Spell Genius!
rules.description: Put your spelling prowess to the test and become a true Spell Genius! Challenge your friends and see who can master the art of vocabulary.
rules.message1: Click 'Start Spell Genius' to begin your journey.
rules.message2: Click 'Hear the Word' to listen to the pronunciation of the hidden word and get a clue.
rules.message3: Spell the Word: Type one letter at a time to guess the word. You have 5 chances!
rules.message4: Decipher the Hints: The letters will light up in different colors to tell you what's right and wrong:
rules.message5: - Green: The letter is in the correct position.
rules.message6: - Red: The letter is in the wrong position or incorrect.
rules.message7: Once you've filled in the entire word, click 'Check Spelling' to see if you are a Spell Genius.
